message.body: FANG Stocks Are Still Cheap, More Gains To Come In 2018 $nflx $fb $amzn $aapl $googl $spy https://mottcapitalmanagement.com/fang-stocks-are-still-cheap-more-gains-to-come-in-2018/

links.title: FANG Stocks Are Still Cheap, More Gains To Come In 2018
links.description: Michael kramer and the clients of mott capital own shares of googl, nflx, and aapl With earnings season pretty much finished, analysts have been steadily adjusting estimates, and as a result, valuations have been re-weighted. It leaves me to believe that the FAANG's will continue to have a strong run, and likely continue to be the market leaders.

messages.body: $AAPL  But what about all those analyst who told me to sell pre E/R? Funny thing is next Q you'll hear the same crap https://www.barrons.com/articles/why-the-buyback-boom-is-bullish-for-investors-1526089472

links.title: Why the Buyback Boom Is Bullish for Investors
links.description: If you need a reason to be in stocks right now, you can look no further than the growing tidal wave of share repurchases. Buybacks usually support stock prices by reducing share counts and boosting earnings per share.

links.title: Apple Slapped With Class Action Lawsuit Over Faulty MacBook Pro Keyboards
links.description: Apple's much-maligned butterfly keyboard design has bugged customers since its release, and now its landed the company in court. Per AppleInsider, the company was hit with a class action lawsuit filed in federal court Friday that alleges Apple knew of defects in the keyboard before the product launched.
